tgt_original: ādeśanādiprātihāryakaraṇasamarthameva jñānamavyāhatatvādbalamuktam |  yadbuddhajñānabalaṃ balānāmiti |  āśravakṣayajñānameva balaṃ balānāṃ madhye prakṛṣṭataram |
yadbuddhajñānadarśanamiti |  jñānaṃ satyādisambodhirabhijñāḥ pañca darśanam |  samyaksambuddho'
dharmasya svādhigamasya dyotikayā prajñāpāramitādeśanayā cakravatpunaḥ punarāmukhīkaraṇārthena pravartanaṃ vineyasantāne vistārīkaraṇam |  panayanāddharmolkāpragrahaṇam |
